description: This hearty and delicious salad is is healthy and full of flavor!
name: Roasted Sweet Potato Salad with Black Beans, Pomegranate & Avocado
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced
2 teaspoons avocado oil, or your favorite oil
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 large avocado, pitted, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees F. On a large sheet pan, toss together cubed sweet potato, oil, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Roast sweet potato until fork tender, 35-40 minutes.
Add the roasted sweet potato to a large bowl along with all the remaining ingredients. Mix until combined. Salad can be served immediately or refrigerated for up to 2 days.*

video.description:
This Roasted Sweet Potato Salad with Avocado and Black Beans is so easy to make!  It's packed with so many delicious ingredients and is sure to be a hit at your next potluck or party!  Great for eating on it's own or dipping chips in!

Get the recipe here:
video.name: How to make Roasted Sweet Potato Salad with Avocado and Black Beans
